fields.text: Thank you for calling PeopleConnect Staffing in San Francisco, where we connect promising companies with the talented professionals who drive success.
To speak with our Recruitment Team, please press [INDEX].
If you are a company looking to hire top talent, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a recruitment specialist.
If you are a professional seeking career opportunities, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to our talent advisors.
For inquiries about existing placements and account status, press [INDEX].
To discuss your current recruitment project, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to your project coordinator.
For billing, invoices, or administrative support, press [INDEX].
Please stay on the line and we will connect you to our support team shortly.
